seo: Shiro,指纹识别,弱密码检测,默认KEY,CBC,GCM模式
seo_en: Shiro,fingerprint recognition,weak password detection,default KEY,CBC,GCM mode
summary: 该插件用于识别应用是否为Shiro应用，并检测是否存在默认KEY（支持CBC/GCM模式），同时尝试利用链检测以发现潜在漏洞
summary_en: This plugin is used to identify whether the application is a Shiro application and detect the existence of default KEY (supporting CBC/GCM modes), while attempting to perform utilization chain detection to discover potential vulnerabilities
